videos.description: Brandon Clarke explodes to the rim on the fast break and readjusts midair to throw down an emphatic slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brandon Clarke attacks the rim for a throwdown) 2022/02/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brandon Clarke attacks the rim for a throwdown
